Where Do You Get The Breeder & All Monsters Cards?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Battle Card Archive (Game Boy): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Where Do You Get The Breeder & All Monsters Cards?
By scitzowicca on Saturday, April 20, 2002 - 10:51 am:

If you really want to complete the game don't you have to get the Breederand All Monsters cards?
Where wil you find them all at i've just got Help, Mango,& Willpower I haven't found anything else where do you find them all at?

By cariy on Sunday, April 21, 2002 - 06:47 am:

you get idems and trade the idems with that gye and get the cards you need.

By Eagle Fierce on Sunday, April 21, 2002 - 08:33 pm:

Correct, Cariy! In order to get ALL of the cards in the game, one must collect a multitude of "Feather" items to trade with Mac. He will tell of cards that choose their owners, and will then ask for the correct passcode. I won't tell what those are, as they are listed in two or three other posts in this section. It's a tedious pain, I'll tell you that much.

Tip: If you NEED "Feather" items, just repeatedly battle Holly beside the 7th ruin. She will occasionally give you a "Feather" for your troubles (though, you'll mostly get "Milkstuff" or other items)

By Harehound5 on Thursday, May 30, 2002 - 07:10 pm:

I'd use the infinate feather code. For other breeder cards like encourage and confusion ,or all monster cards like criticle bet exteremely rare cards like evil dance. It's also the same way to get cards like Pixie's enchant and Golem's cyclone.

By Khoi M. Luong, the master breeder. on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 11:26 am:

Get strong and cool cards like Evil Dance, Spin Cut, Flame, Tongue, Bite, Brow Hit, Kick, Chop, Double Chop, Whirl Blow, Evil Blows, and Evil Blows........... Try it out, it should help you on all of yous deck, OK?

By Zero on Sunday, June 2, 2002 - 11:27 am:

You cn always get better cards when you keep beating thee game.....
